key: ...I saw none other than Kazuhito, with NAOMI of all people! Have you *ever* seen those two together?
en: ...I saw none other than Kazuhito, with NAOMI of all people! Have you *ever* seen those two together?
pt: ...vi nem mais, nem menos, que o Francisco, com a NOÉLIA de toda a gente! Já *alguma* vez os viste juntos?

key: Girl, I swear on my entire bloodline. They were both there!
en: Girl, I swear on my entire bloodline. They were both there!
pt: Miúda, eu juro pelo meu sangue. Eles estavam lá juntos!

key: I didn't hear much, but I think he was like... venting??? To her???
en: I didn't hear much, but I think he was like... venting??? To her???
pt: Eu cá não ouvi muita coisa, mas eu acho que ele estava a tipo… desabafar??? Com ela???

key: I got something funny to tell ya, listen...
en: I got something funny to tell ya, listen...
pt: Eu tenho uma coisa engraçada para te contar, ouve só…

key: KAZUHITO??? Of all people, KAZUHITO was venting his woes to Naomi??? No way that happened.
en: KAZUHITO??? Of all people, KAZUHITO was venting his woes to Naomi??? No way that happened.
pt: O FRANCISCO??? De todas as pessoas, o FRANCISCO estava a desabafar com a Noélia??? Estás a gozar.

key: No fucking way. What were they doing?
en: No fucking way. What were they doing?
pt: Nem por sombras. Que é que estavam a fazer?
Oh, Ândria… como é que andas?

key: So, I was passing by the gym this morning after my swimming workout, and...
en: So, I was passing by the gym this morning after my swimming workout, and...
pt: Então, eu estava a passar pelo ginásio de manhã depois do meu treino de natação, e…

key: Still can't believe that man had a softie side...
en: Still can't believe that man had a softie side...
pt: Ainda não acredito que aquele homem tem um lado sensível…

key: Yeah, yeah, sure, whatever you say...
en: Yeah, yeah, sure, whatever you say...
pt: Sim, sim, pois, o que quer que te deixe dormir melhor…
